verses.name: John 18:10
verses.text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it, and smote the high priest’s servant, and cut off his right ear. The servant’s name was Malchus.

verses.name: John 18:11
verses.text: Then said Jesus unto Peter, Put up thy sword into the sheath: the cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it?

verses.name: John 18:12
verses.text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus, and bound him,

verses.name: John 18:13
verses.text: And led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.
